examples: He's putting himself forward as a president whose ideas are in sync with (= are suited to and show an understanding of) a nation demanding change.

definitions.definition: If two things are in/out of sync, they reach the same or related stage at the same time/at different times.

examples: The action on the screen syncs perfectly with the music.

definitions.definition: to connect two electronic devices so that they both have the latest information or files:
examples: How do I sync my iPhone to my computer?
